definitions.definition: A fluoroquinolone antibiotic C 18 H 20 FN 3 O 4 composed of equal quantities of levofloxacin and dextrofloxacin , that is a broad-spectrum antibacterial agent that is used in topical solution for otic or ophthalmic use or is administered orally or intravenously for other uses.

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) A fluoroquinolone antibiotic C 18 H 20 FN 3 O 4 composed of equal quantities of levofloxacin and dextrofloxacin , that is a broad-spectrum antibacterial agent that is used in topical solution for otic or ophthalmic use or is administered orally or intravenously for other uses.
